languages.text: {n}Руки не слушаются вас. Ухмыляющийся ксенос склоняет голову и с любопытством наблюдает за конвульсиями, бьющими ваши конечности.{/n} "Сигнальная болевая система мон-кай устроена так непрактично. Она способна заглушить все прочие импульсы в мозгу — мыслительную деятельность, моторику... Пожалуй, это единственное, что вы действительно умеете делать лучше многих рас — испытывать боль".

{n}You cannot move your arms. The xenos smiles faintly and cocks his head, watching as convulsions rack your every limb.{/n} "Mon-keigh pain signals are so impractical. They drown out every other impulse in your brain — cognitive processes, motor patterns. This is indeed the only advantage you have over most other races — you are better at feeling pain."
languages.original_text: {n}Руки не слушаются вас. Ухмыляющийся ксенос склоняет голову и с любопытством наблюдает за конвульсиями, бьющими ваши конечности.{/n} "Сигнальная болевая система мон-кай устроена так непрактично. Она способна заглушить все прочие импульсы в мозгу — мыслительную деятельность, моторику... Пожалуй, это единственное, что вы действительно умеете делать лучше многих рас — испытывать боль".

They drown out every other impulse in your brain — cognitive processes, motor patterns. This is indeed the only advantage you have over most other races — you are better at feeling pain."

languages.text: {n}腕を動かすことができない。異種族はかすかに微笑み、首をかしげながら、あなたが四肢を痙攣させるのを眺めている。{/n}「モン＝ケイの痛みの信号は、とても非実用的だ。それらは、認知プロセス、運動パターンなど、存他の脳のあらゆる信号をかき消してしまう。これは、お前たちの種族が他の種族よりも優っている点ーーそう、お前たちは痛みを感じるのが上手いのだよ」
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot move your arms. The xenos smiles faintly and cocks his head, watching as convulsions rack your every limb.{/n} "Mon-keigh pain signals are so impractical. They drown out every other impulse in your brain — cognitive processes, motor patterns. This is indeed the only advantage you have over most other races — you are better at feeling pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}腕を動かすことができない。異種族はかすかに微笑み、首をかしげながら、あなたが四肢を痙攣させるのを眺めている。{/n}「モン＝ケイの痛みの信号は、とても非実用的だ。それらは、認知プロセス、運動パターンなど、存他の脳のあらゆる信号をかき消してしまう。これは、お前たちの種族が他の種族よりも優っている点ーーそう、お前たちは痛みを感じるのが上手いのだよ」

languages.text: {n}你的手臂完全不听从使唤。血伶人微微一笑，抬起头，看着你的四肢不住地抽搐。{/n}“猴子的疼痛信号真的是完全不讲道理。只要它一出现，你们大脑中所有其他冲动，无论是认知过程还是运动模式，都会被彻底淹没。和绝大多数种族相比，这是你们的唯一优势——你们感知疼痛的能力更强。”
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot move your arms. The xenos smiles faintly and cocks his head, watching as convulsions rack your every limb.{/n} "Mon-keigh pain signals are so impractical. They drown out every other impulse in your brain — cognitive processes, motor patterns. This is indeed the only advantage you have over most other races — you are better at feeling pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的手臂完全不听从使唤。血伶人微微一笑，抬起头，看着你的四肢不住地抽搐。{/n}“猴子的疼痛信号真的是完全不讲道理。只要它一出现，你们大脑中所有其他冲动，无论是认知过程还是运动模式，都会被彻底淹没。和绝大多数种族相比，这是你们的唯一优势——你们感知疼痛的能力更强。”

languages.text: {n}Vous ne parvenez pas à bouger les bras. Le xénos sourit légèrement et incline la tête tandis qu'il observe les convulsions qui secouent chacun de vos membres.{/n} « Les signaux de douleur des mon-keigh ne sont vraiment pas pratiques. Ils étouffent tous les autres signaux du cerveau : les processus cognitifs, les schémas moteurs... C'est bien le seul avantage que vous ayez par rapport aux autres races... Vous ressentez mieux la douleur. »
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot move your arms. The xenos smiles faintly and cocks his head, watching as convulsions rack your every limb.{/n} "Mon-keigh pain signals are so impractical. They drown out every other impulse in your brain — cognitive processes, motor patterns. This is indeed the only advantage you have over most other races — you are better at feeling pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne parvenez pas à bouger les bras. Le xénos sourit légèrement et incline la tête tandis qu'il observe les convulsions qui secouent chacun de vos membres.{/n} « Les signaux de douleur des mon-keigh ne sont vraiment pas pratiques. Ils étouffent tous les autres signaux du cerveau : les processus cognitifs, les schémas moteurs... C'est bien le seul avantage que vous ayez par rapport aux autres races... Vous ressentez mieux la douleur. »

languages.text: {n}No puedes mover los brazos. El xenos sonríe levemente y ladea la cabeza, observando cómo las convulsiones sacuden tus extremidades.{/n} «Las señales de dolor mon-keigh son muy poco prácticas. Ahogan cualquier otro impulso de vuestros cerebros: procesos cognitivos y patrones de movimiento. Es la única ventaja que tenéis respecto a la mayoría de razas: sufrís el dolor de manera más intensa».
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot move your arms. The xenos smiles faintly and cocks his head, watching as convulsions rack your every limb.{/n} "Mon-keigh pain signals are so impractical. They drown out every other impulse in your brain — cognitive processes, motor patterns. This is indeed the only advantage you have over most other races — you are better at feeling pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}No puedes mover los brazos. El xenos sonríe levemente y ladea la cabeza, observando cómo las convulsiones sacuden tus extremidades.{/n} «Las señales de dolor mon-keigh son muy poco prácticas. Ahogan cualquier otro impulso de vuestros cerebros: procesos cognitivos y patrones de movimiento. Es la única ventaja que tenéis respecto a la mayoría de razas: sufrís el dolor de manera más intensa».

languages.text: {n}Du kannst deine Arme nicht bewegen. Der Xenos lächelt schwach und beobachtet, wie dein ganzer Körper von Krämpfen gebeutelt wird.{/n} "Schmerzsignale von Chem-Pan-Sey sind so unpraktisch. Sie unterdrücken jeden anderen Impuls in Eurem Gehirn ... kognitive Prozesse, die Motorik. Das ist tatsächlich der einzige Vorteil, den Ihr gegenüber den meisten anderen Völkern habt ... Ihr könnt Schmerzen besser spüren."
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot move your arms. The xenos smiles faintly and cocks his head, watching as convulsions rack your every limb.{/n} "Mon-keigh pain signals are so impractical. They drown out every other impulse in your brain — cognitive processes, motor patterns. This is indeed the only advantage you have over most other races — you are better at feeling pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kannst deine Arme nicht bewegen. Der Xenos lächelt schwach und beobachtet, wie dein ganzer Körper von Krämpfen gebeutelt wird.{/n} "Schmerzsignale von Chem-Pan-Sey sind so unpraktisch. Sie unterdrücken jeden anderen Impuls in Eurem Gehirn ... kognitive Prozesse, die Motorik. Das ist tatsächlich der einzige Vorteil, den Ihr gegenüber den meisten anderen Völkern habt ... Ihr könnt Schmerzen besser spüren."

languages.text: {n}Kollarını hareket ettiremiyorsun. Zeno, hafifçe gülümseyip başını yana eğiyor ve tüm uzuvlarını etkisi altına alan, acılı kasılmaları izliyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh acı sinyalleri en ufak bir işe yaramaz. Beyninizdeki bilişsel süreçler, motor kalıplar gibi tüm diğer dürtüleri tüketiyor. Diğer ırklara kıyasla tek bir avantajınız var: Acıyı hissetmek konusunda iyisiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}You cannot move your arms. The xenos smiles faintly and cocks his head, watching as convulsions rack your every limb.{/n} "Mon-keigh pain signals are so impractical. They drown out every other impulse in your brain — cognitive processes, motor patterns. This is indeed the only advantage you have over most other races — you are better at feeling pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kollarını hareket ettiremiyorsun. Zeno hafifçe gülümseyip başını yana eğiyor, tüm uzuvlarını etkisi altına alan, acılı kasılmaları izliyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh acı sinyalleri son derece işe yaramaz. Beyninizdeki bilişsel süreçler, motor kalıplar gibi tüm diğer dürtüleri tüketiyorlar. Çoğu diğer ırka kıyasla tek avantajınız bu gerçekten: Acıyı hissetmek konusunda iyisiniz."
